## Loading the data 

```{r}
#| label: "load-data" 

expression_meta_data_aug <- read_tsv(file = here("data/01_expression_meta_data_clean.tsv.gz"))


```

## Write the augmentet dataset to a tsv.gz file

```{r}
#| label: "write-clean-data-to-tsv.gz"

data_dir <- here("data/")


write_tsv( x = expression_meta_data_aug,
           file = str_c(data_dir, 
                  "04_expression_meta_data_aug.tsv.gz"))


```
